summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6 Packs 18inch Striaght Goddess Locs With Curly Ends Faux Locs Crochet Twist Hair Soft Synthetic Braiding Hair Extension Wavy Faux Locs Twist Hair (18inch, T1b-99J)
Review Date: 2020/07/28
Store: AGO
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AGO', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Sew-In', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 9.17 x 3.46 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '692232235161'}
Review Text: It would be advisable to be transparent. The image corresponding to 1B/Burgundy was true only for 1 set but I ordered 2 sets. The 2nd set was beet root red which was not what the image depicted. It’s bad enough that the Black Race have to find creative ways to present our hair. We don’t need the additional huddle of eCommerce dishonesty. This merchant needs to learn a thing or two about the color spectrum. For real. I don’t even have the adjective to describe how thin the Locs are... all in the name of making more money!!!!
Review Title: eCommerce deserves Honesty
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 7 Packs Dreadlocs Faux Locs Hair Extensions 18 Inch Straight Goddess Locs Black Synthetic Crochet Hair Soft Crochet Braids (18 Inch, 1B#)
Review Date: 2020/08/01
Store: XCHSLB
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'XCHSLB', 'Color': 'black', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12.1 x 8.5 x 3.4 inches; 14.39 Ounces'}
Review Text: Good Softness & thickness but for the love of hair please trim the fly-aways please. The “look” we are targeting by wearing straight Locs is a streamlined look... without hairs sticking out in various directions. If this merchant can deal with this issue, they have a good thing going here. If not, I’m sorry I can’t be a repeat customer.
Review Title: Finesse your Product Please
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 7 Packs Faux Locs Crochet Hair With Curly Ends 16 Inch Dreadlocs Goddess Locs Crochet Braids Synthetic Braiding Hair Extension (16 Inch, T30#)

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2 Pack Nail Soaking Bowl Acrylic Nail Remover Soak Off Tray Polish Remove Wash Soaker Manicure Spa Tool
Review Date: 2021/05/05
Store: CADEVED
Product Description: ['More About Our Nail Soaking Bowl', "Professional acetone resistant soak off warm nail spa bowl manicure, a good tool to soak your nails off a lot easier.  Suitable for nail treatment, removing false nails and cuticle, nail nutrition & sterilization treatments. Easy to soak off your acrylic and gel nails.  You can fill the bottom bowl with hot water and place the top bowl in it, to hurry along the removal process. Warm water in the bottom keeps the acetone in the wells warm. It works with acetone alone (without the water below), but it will be faster and more pleasant with the added warmth.  When soaking you nail, your hand can be comfortable resting on the 'bump', comfortable hand/finger placement.", 'Material:', 'Plastic', 'Color:', 'Pink', 'Package Include:', '2 pack nail spa bowls']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'CADEVED', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.02 x 7.13 x 3.15 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': '5A-S1UZ-4S9K', 'UPC': '726972777343', 'Manufacturer': 'CADEVED'}
Review Text: What’s not to love. You save, save, save on nail polish remover. Thanks a zillion to inventor. This is such a big help, really.
Review Title: Big Help
Rating: 5.0

    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual shows a distinct preference for hair extensions, specifically those within the 16-18 inch range, favoring synthetic materials and various styles like curly and straight locs. However, they express frustration with product discrepancies, particularly regarding color accuracy and quality consistency. Their negative reviews highlight a demand for transparency and quality control in eCommerce, indicating a low tolerance for misleading product representations, emphasizing the need for better delivery on expectations.

In contrast, the consumer's experience with non-hair accessories, such as hair ties and nail soaking bowls, reveals a more favorable attitude, characterized by satisfaction with functionality and value, suggesting a willingness to engage with diverse hair-related products that offer variety and effectiveness. The hair ties received positive feedback for their variety, whereas the nail tool provided significant utility and perceived savings, demonstrating an appreciation for practical, cost-effective solutions.

Overall, the individual is quality-sensitive and vigilant about value for money, especially in the beauty and haircare sector, while also appreciating a range of options in other accessories. This consumer likely prioritizes aesthetic appeal alongside reliable performance in their purchases.

target_interaction.title: Solid product
target_interaction.text: Solid product. Can’t wait to slink it up in my hair with diff dos. Would have given 5 stars but for the fact I ordered the bright multicolor set photographed as blue, pink etc but I got the option with just the other set. This eCommerce switcheroo is the reason some prefer brick and mortar shopping bcos some retailers just send online shoppers anything they like and not what the image, description & order details actually state.
target_interaction.title_meta: Canlierr 6 Pieces Simple Metal U Shaped Hair Pin French Style Hairpins Fork Sticks 2 Prong Updo Chignon Pins Hair Accessories for Long Hair Women Girls (Pink, Blue, Gold, Silver)
